models

bot

package bot

Visibility
  1. Public
  2. All

Type Members

  1. case class BotCommand(command: String) extends Product with Serializable

    Execute commands for the bot.

  2. case class BotLog(created: Long, task: String, log: String, associateId: Option[String], associateImg: Option[String]) extends Product with Serializable

    Represents user-controlled state of the bot.

  3. case class BotState(keepActive: Boolean, state: String) extends Product with Serializable

    Represents user-controlled state of the bot.

  4. class BotSupervisor extends Actor

    Supervisor that overlooks child actors making requests to external API services

  5. class BotThrottle extends Actor with FSM[State, Data]

    A throttler that uses a timer to control the message delivery rate.

Value Members

  1. object Throttler

    A throttler is an actor that is defined through a target actor and a rate (of type akka.contrib.throttle.Throttler.Rate).

  2. package tasks

Ungrouped
